about_the_game:
Dive into a groundbreaking visual novel experience that redefines storytelling with an unprecedented level of interactivity. With over 55 unique paths and interactions, you're in control of how the narrative unfolds in this richly detailed world.

  • Dynamic Storytelling: Navigate through four distinct episodes, each offering a unique gameplay experience:

    • Episodes 1 & 2: Massive in scope, these episodes are all about player choice, offering countless decision points that influence the story's direction. Your decisions truly matter here.

    • Episodes 3 & 4: Shift to a more cinematic experience with professional voice acting and immersive sound effects (SFX), creating a movie-like atmosphere.

  • Variety of Content: Explore a broad spectrum of romantic and erotic narratives, featuring both girl-girl and man-woman relationships. The content ranges from softcore to hardcore, ensuring there's something for every taste:

    • Multi-Character Scenes: Experience scenes with anywhere from two to five characters, each adding depth and complexity to the interactions.

  • Character Customization: Personalize your journey by choosing your character's outfits.

  • Engaging Visuals and Sound: High-quality art and animations bring each scene to life, complemented by a soundtrack that enhances the emotional impact of the story.

  • Cindy's Role: While Cindy is not the main character in Bedtime Stories 3, she is the one who links all the other visual novels together.

Whether you're here for the romance, the drama, or the exploration of deep character relationships, this visual novel promises a new way to engage with the genre. Every choice you make can lead to a new path, new relationships, and new endings.

See other visual novels bundled together here on Steam:

  • Midnight Stories (1-5)

  • Dark Desire (1-6)

  • Dark Desire Mute (1-7)

  • Bedtime Stories (1 and 2)

A huge collection that sometimes has animations, real person voice acting, a wide range of audio sound effects, background music and sounds, etc.

Prepare to lose yourself in a world where your decisions shape the story, and the story shapes you.
